entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending late this evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers late this evening and after midnight then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 overnight. Forecast issued 9:59 PM EDT Thursday 27 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of rain showers in the morning. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 12. Wind chill minus 3 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 9:59 PM EDT Thursday 27 April 2023
